item.title: Half Life 2 Opposing Force 2
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
Scrab_on_mars:

It’s crap. Half of the things are taken straight out of HL2. The other half is shit. I mean, they transformed the desert into a forest. Look at those trees in the background. There should be Mesas, and those idiots have the nerve to say their trailer is a good rival to BM’s one. And why do I have the feeling this thing I posted is 90% off-topic?

In your post these is nothing like “The Fucking Topic”, this should be posted in “Compare BMS trailer to OF2 trailer” it is base on “after 7 hour war” it is wrong to using some of HL2 stuff?
And otherwise, here is your reward, i am fucking tired of posting faceplam on the jerk speak without thinking like me and you. And this will be last.

Enjoy.:facepalm:

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life 2 Opposing Force 2
item.dc:creator: Omega_Absolute
item.description:
Because none of it has to do with what the mod is about. This isn’t a remake of OP4, but rather a sequel of sorts.

Opposing Force 2 takes place in the Seven Hours War aftermath (meaning that you do not face the war itself). The game focuses on erasing a portal rift from Earth. Back in the timeline of Opposing Force, a VTOL was captured by the xenians for examination. That helicopter was kept in a xenian vault, and as the years passed, it overloaded itself with xenian rocks and material. Due to such a massive amount of xenian crystals, the helicopter ended up with enough energy to make a portal rift on its own, as it teleported to Earth, it caused a huge explosion of energy and consequently, a portal rift, that gave the xenians a ticket to Earth. Shephard gets awaken by the G-Man, and given the objective of closing the portal rift.

          The Combine takeover resulted in the creation of many rebellion groups, including the Phoenix Army, a huge anti-combine group of trained marines who have made it through the Seven Hours War, in Opposing Force 2, Shephard will be fighting on their side. But while the Phoenix Army wants to destroy the crystal and close the rift, the Combine wants to steal the crystal to maximize their portal technology.

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life 2 Opposing Force 2
item.dc:creator: Android11x
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

Trailer would be more impressive if it didn’t have the zombies. They’re just so damn identical.

Ah, see! Where most mods fail with the generic zombies, Get a Life succeeded. I mean the combat system was trash and annoying, but overall GaL was incredible.

item.description:
Scorpion42:

To all you people who hate this mod: GTFO.
Also, about the complaints about broken junk: I bet there will be tons of it after the resonance cascade in Black Mesa so STFU.
Thank You.

What a braveful man, good job.

Btw Adrian is a ninja under gas mask.

item.title: Half Life 2 Opposing Force 2
item.dc:creator: Skilgannon
item.description:
Ew. That idiotic twat? I hate him. I always want to “accidentally” pull the trigger on the rpg when he gives it to you, but something always stops me. Maybe the knowledge that critical npc’s are all but invulnerable, maybe self preservation, maybe that I’m gonna get to kick the arse of a gunship in less than a minute…who knows? Post point:

I hate Odessa Cubbage.

If you knew enough about it to be allowed to critisize it seriously you would know that it takes place DURING THE 7 HOUR WAR which means that City 17 were only in blueprint-stage back then. I don’t see that the rest of your arguments make sense either.

So the combine designed and built a run-down post-soviet eastern european city, neighboring towns and mines as a human habitat or something?
